name: Fine Art: Picture Puzzles
description:
Big collection of jigsaw puzzles from famous classic fine art masterpieces
Play beautiful jigsaw puzzles, discover famous classic masterpieces. Over and more puzzles with great details more coming...

- The new iPad and iPhone Retina support with high resolution images
- Large selection of levels and puzzle types
- Max to 5x6 puzzles
- Once correctly connected, jigsaw pieces will remain intact for easier further play
- Magnet field will put puzzle pieces to right place


OUR BIG COLLECTION:
- Claude Monet
- Edouard Manet
- Van Gogh
- Renoir
- Paul Cezanne
- Leonardo da Vinci
